caption:
This photograph captures a serene, natural riverside scene. The focus of the image is a riverbank lined with a dense forest. The water appears calm, with slight ripples indicating a gentle flow. The foreground of the photo shows the shoreline where the water meets the bank, strewn with small branches and debris, suggesting recent activity or natural debris collection.

The forest in the background is lush, featuring a variety of trees and underbrush. The trees are densely packed, showing different shades of green, and some trees have brown and red foliage suggesting either a change in season or different species of trees. Sunlight filters through the trees, creating patches of light and shadow on the ground which adds to the peaceful and secluded feel of the scene.

There are no visible people or man-made objects in the shot, emphasizing the untouched and serene quality of the location. The overall atmosphere is one of tranquility and natural beauty, offering a glimpse into a quiet, undisturbed forest riverside scene.
title: Scene showing the high water mark which reveals evidence of trees being coated by oil along the shore of the Ohio river near Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.  Booms have been placed near various outfalls to trap pollution with oil acidity content and low ph
